list.title: App#getWorldPositionFromScreen
list.description: Converts screen coordinates to world coordinates. This method uses the screen position (normalized coordinates) to calculate a ray and find where it intersects the objects in the scene.

list.title: App#init
list.description: Initializes Three.js rendering on a given canvas element.

list.title: App#setBillboard
list.description: Sets the floorplan used as a texture for 2D billboards.

list.title: App#setIsHeatmapColor
list.description: Sets whether to show the heatmap or not.

list.title: App#setIsIsosurface
list.description: Sets whether to show the isoSurface or not.

list.title: App#setIsPointcloud
list.description: Sets whether to show the pointclod or not.

list.title: App#setIsRealTimeVolumeRendering
list.description: Sets whether to show the real-time volume rendering or not.

list.title: App#setIsSignalIndex
list.description: Sets whether to show the indexMap or not.

list.title: App#setIsVolumeRendering
list.description: Sets whether to show the volume rendering or not.

list.title: App#setIsoValue
list.description: Sets visuilizeation isoValue to show the isosurface.

list.title: App#setLayouts
list.description: Sets layout data including AABBs, planes, position, and texture.

list.title: App#setSignal
list.description: Sets a signal at specific positions in a 3D dimension.

list.title: App#setSignalChannels
list.description: Sets the channel for each signal.

list.title: App#setSignalIntensities
list.description: Sets the intensity for each signal.

list.title: App#setTexture
list.description: Sets the floorplan textures for rooms.

list.title: HeatmapMaterial#setUniforms
list.description: Sets uniforms for the application.

list.title: HeatmapTextureMaterial#setUniforms
list.description: Sets uniforms for the application.

list.title: RoomBufferGeometry#setAABB
list.description: Sets the Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) data.

list.title: RoomBufferGeometry#setPlane
list.description: Sets the plane data.

list.title: THREE
list.description: A namespace defined for three.js. It is used to unify types and provide a standardized interface for working with Three.js objects.

list.title: Vector
list.description: A namespace defined for fixed-size array.

list.title: Vector.Vector2
list.description: Represents a two-dimensional coordinate [x, y].

list.title: Vector.Vector3
list.description: Represents a three-dimensional coordinate [x, y, z].

list.title: Vector.Vector3Pair
list.description: Represents a coordinate pair [[x1, y1, z1], [x2, y2, z2]].

list.title: VolumeRenderingMaterial#setDataTexture
list.description: Sets dataTexture for the application.

list.title: VolumeRenderingMaterial#setUniforms
list.description: Sets uniforms for the application.
